title: bundles
body: what happens if you already own one of the skins in the bundles does it cut off ?

replies.body:
A lot of the bundles are now **flexible bundles**, which means they discount the cost based on content you already own within them. Our initial announcement and breakdown on these types of bundles can be found [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/flexible-cost-bundles-available-now-0)

Let me know if this cleared it up for you. :)
